website_summaries.verdict: An affordable solution for moviegoers who wear glasses and want to enjoy 3D theatrical movies without the hassle of wearing a second pair of glasses.
pros: These polarized 3D lenses clip onto your prescription glasses
They are lightweight and rimless so they provide no distraction while wearing
The lenses are durable and attach firmly to your prescription glasses so they don't wiggle
cons: Remember, these 3D glasses are not a replacement for active shutter 3D glasses
They're designed for passive polarized 3D technology

customer_reviews.title: You need these, whether you realize it or not
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how much a difference these clip-ons would make. Let me just say it turned night into day. The weight is so much lighter vs the framed 3D glasses layered over your prescription eyewear. These lenses also seem a bit brighter vs the 3D glasses brought home from a movie theatre. If, like me, you have frameless eyeglasses, these lenses also remove that tunnel vision you can get with the thick-framed movie theatre 3D glasses. I consider these a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Equanimity

customer_reviews.title: Works at my local IMAX in Hooksett NH, so much better than the over-sized ones!!
customer_reviews.text: I realize that the 3D glasses you get from the movie theatre are a one size fits all type deal that are meant to fit over regular glasses, but if you don't wear glasses they are not optimal. I picked these up after having a horrible experience in a theatre where one of my lenses was scratched all to heck and the other had circles all over it that I couldn't wipe off. I've used these in two recent movies and they are so much better than the oversized ones. If you've ever been to an IMAX 3D movie and just painfully aware of the glasses the whole time, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly and a MUCH better way to see 3-D when you wear glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these last night to see Avengers: Infinity Way in IMAX 3-D. Worked perfectly; the image clarity was excellent and they fit so much better than putting theater glasses over my regular glasses. I am SO glad I bought these and would recommend them to anybody with glasses who likes to see 3-D films.
customer_reviews.author: B. McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable, fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I fumbled with the 3D glassed that came with my LG, they, like most are just like the movie theater glasses, were cheap with Mylar type lenses. They always strained my eyes and NEVER fit over my own glasses, always moving, re-adjusting and so on. These clip on glasses are very well made, plastic lens as opposed to those other types, they never slip, I don't have to readjust my head, and they fit snug to my glasses, come in a nice little case and are better made, which makes for a fantastic view, and no more eye strain, I can't believe I put up with those old ones for so long. VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: BozX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: Wearing prescription glasses always made IMAX hard to deal with. Especially when I can't wear contacts. These have been a lifesaver. I like they came with a hard case and a cleaning cloth so I can carry in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nth

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for RealD cinema.
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I ordered these, and super glad I got them in time for Avengers Endgame. Cinema glasses in addition to my own glasses irritate my face and I have to take breaks during movies, these gave me a better view and I could wear them through the whole film. Fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda K Byatt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice upgrade from free 3D glasses at the movie theatre
customer_reviews.text: Got these because my kid always complains about movie theatre 3D glasses being uncomfortable (and there's nothing worse than sqirming kids when watching a movie...) These work great and look great, and are definitely more comfortable than the free ones. My only complaint is a minor one: Why does the set only come with 2 pouches when there are 4 pairs of glasses? Not subtracting any star for that as it's as deacribed - just a little strange, and may be inconvenient if you want to give out the 4 pairs to 4 individuals.
customer_reviews.author: ciniminis

customer_reviews.title: Best Experience!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these 3D glasses for me and her date night/movie times together. My wife wears prescription glasses and she always would complain about sore eyes when she wore the theatres generic 3D glasses. Especially when she would try to wear her 3D movie glasses over her own. I had no idea just how much better they would be! Way better than those cheap plastic ones they have at the Theatre. We used your glasses to watch at our Local theatre Frozen2. Great Movie Btw! My The 3D movie Experience was Unmatched!! We both are beyond pleased for our 3D Experience has been hijacked and taken to another Level!! Thank You For Everything!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian808

customer_reviews.title: Awesome possum!
customer_reviews.text: We love these they don't pinch and are very comfortable. Plus we don't have to worry about other people who have worn theater glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for my grandkids. They have a 3D movie that they can watch now!
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: I WEAR GLASSES
customer_reviews.text: I wear glasses so I hated putting 3-D glasses over top of my glasses. these worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my daughter to be able to watch a 4dx movie with me. She does not like wearing contacts and these clips allow her to wear her normal glasses and watch 3d movies. They are very delicate but come with cases which I am so glad of.
customer_reviews.author: Limey1066

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: So I normally dont do reviews but I juys had to on this product I've worn glasses most of my life and when I want to watch movies in 3d I have to put on what essentially is another pair of glasses on top and they're uncomfortable big frames so you have to constantly adjust, but with this product it goes on so seamless and you don't even notice it's there went through a full 2 hour movie and I didn't have to adjust them once.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron p

customer_reviews.title: They look cheap, but are Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightweight of this glasses. The carry bag is very good made and looks great. The cleaning clothe is a bonus. I don't like the plastic used to make the frame of this glasses, looks cheap, they look fragile. If you take care of them, and if you are careful they will last forever. They let you have a better 3D experience than the ones you get at theaters.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Machado

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for (then Again)
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what was intended, light weight comfort fit, couldn't see it when on. only 1 issue is that it feels like i might break them. over all, great product. Review Change: Went to the movies a second time, brought other pair, did not work at all, had to use big blocky ones. Next time I will bring both pairs, see what happens, might just be 1 pair messed up. we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bernd

customer_reviews.title: They are not 3D glasses.  I would not recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3D fabric to make my grandchildren quilts for Christmas. I used some 3D paper glasses given in a kids meal to view the fabric in 3D and was impressed with the fabric and continued to make the quilts. I decided to buy them a "nice pair" of 3D glasses to give them with their quilts. Unfortunately, these glasses do NOT work. However, the glasses that came with the kids meal work! I could have saved some money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: VWS

customer_reviews.title: Short lived Upgrade from the freebies at the theater.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have light weight glasses and it wasn’t pulling them down. Much better than the free ones they give you at the theater. Update: tried to use them yesterday. They no longer worked as well as the ones from the theater. Due to longevity I am no longer able to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Barhight

customer_reviews.title: Very nice frames, good lenses.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the design of these is very good. They came in a black paper box with pouches for each one. I felt that there may be a bit more clarity with the LG glasses but both are good.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I received some LG clip ones a few years ago. Lost, I needed a replacement. I had a few minor things that had bothered me from the previous glasses. These are lightweight, fit my oversized trendy ish eye frames, and have a clean/crisp image. I find most too cloudy/dark. These are perfect. Only annoyance, but easily fixable, I took a sharpie and just wrote IMAX on one of the cases. I was annoyed with either having to make sure I’m grabbing the correct set and/or “just bring both and figure it out later”.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: After trying out this set I bought another. These work great at the Imax and Real 3D theaters. Works on my Passive 3D TV. They are very comfortable and fits over glasses with on problem, way better than the ones they give you at the theaters Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Beats all others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have used the real D 3D glasses three times at home and once at the theatre so far and I am delighted with them. They are lightweight, ho over my glasses easily and seem to be sturdy so far. I really love how much brighter it is with these glasses! I don’t even have to take them off to see in a dark theatre, unlike others I have used. Each pair ( IMAX and RealD 3D ) comes with its own case and cleaning cloth. Another great thing is that there is no sight obstruction with these glasses unlike some with large nose clips on the bridge. Overall I am absolutely delighted with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Landon A Bentley

customer_reviews.title: aesthetically pleasing, far cry from the old cardboard ones
customer_reviews.text: I can only review these glasses aesthetically, as my television does not allow for 3D viewing. Glasses are nice and made well. They look good and are a far cry from the old cardboard ones. If you have a 3D ready TV I would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: R. Scaglione

customer_reviews.title: Not reccomending !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Imax clips didn't work at all !!! (in imax movie thatre) real3d one worked but was not perfect, time by time i had to adjust them to see the movie, imax clipons are completely useless i tried couple of times during the movie to switch but it wasn't doing anything and one of sides of the glass was darker than the other,even if it had shown 3d still you would see darker in one eye which is very noticable and not pleasent at all, from my experience don't waste your money !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: That I dont have to wear the theater glasses over my own.
customer_reviews.author: jclcoldfire

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: While I was only able to test the RealD 3D clip-ons, I like how this product covers my frame entirely while also being bright and lightweight. The 3D quality beats original RealD 3D glasses quality. This completely opens up future movies playing in either RealD 3D or IMAX 3D, as they were off limits until I came across this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kim

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These are useless. Literally just really ugly sunglasses. Even if they worked (which they don’t) they are so dark you can’t hardly see the screen anyway. The would maybe make ok safety glasses if you’re needing eye protection/light protection or sunglasses to fit over prescription lenses and you don’t care what you look like.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for Those Who Wear Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I used to never go to 3D movies, who wants to wear glasses over glasses? These are easy to clip on, big enough to cover my current lenses and picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for four eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as we were tired of putting the 3D glasses over our own glasses - they never fit or felt right. These fit our lenses perfectly and the picture quality was great. The only complaint is they send two pair (Real 3D and IMAX) in separate cases, which is great but they don't label which is which. Had to figure it out by trial and error in a dark theater and of course I picked the wrong ones first. But once I changed to the Read 3D I was quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: These glasses work perfect .clear picture, comfortable ,nice wide view ,great price .highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: don't work
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be great so I wouldn't have to wear my glasses plus have the weight of the 3D glasses. I thought having the 3D closer to my eyes would also improve my overall acuity. But they just failed to provide the 3D effect.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: There are worse lenses. There are also much better ones.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how lightweight these glasses are over my Rx glasses. However they don’t really tell you which is HD. & which is imax - I found out by fumbling for the other pair during the movie. Also they are a bit hard to get in, especially if you’re trying to get them in without getting your fingerprints all over them. Once the correct lens are on they’re pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Connolly

customer_reviews.title: these do not work on lg tv
customer_reviews.text: these do not work i thought it was m setting for a while but it turns out that the just dont work with the tv the low rating is just because the are useless to me
customer_reviews.author: james bradley

customer_reviews.title: Two different types of glasses here...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these because of the small clip, doesn't interfere with my viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Johnson

customer_reviews.title: If you wear a small to smaller style glasses by the small style of 3-D glasses
customer_reviews.text: These 3D glasses are exactly as described! They truly are lightweight yet sturdy. They clip on quite easily to your existing glasses. I’ve provided a photo of how the clip on mechanism looks, along w 2 other photos.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lacorte

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: They work just like they’re supposed to. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: boss435

customer_reviews.title: Must have for imax 3D enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: No question if you go to a lot of imax 3D these are way better than movie theater ones not even close
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what I want them to and they are comfortable. Much better than relying on the theater for dirty or scratched glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Badman

customer_reviews.title: This product really works well....
customer_reviews.text: Pro Tip: Bring your own 3D Glasses :D This product really works well.... #recommended
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Veerappan

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These are a replacement for another pair that broke. The previous pair had a spring-loaded hinge that easily clasped over the bride, this pair does not. It’s very stiff and did not center itself well on my glasses. They keep sliding up, becoming crooked, etc. Eventually bent the tines and then they were acceptable. Can’t comment on durability as I’ve only seen one movie with them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rorie

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Came VERY quickly!. Worked great on my 3D TV. Did not try the I=MAX ones. Clips on easily. Completely covers eyeglass lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Pallid Un

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The glasses would not clip onto mine. The clips were very stiff & would not adjust at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Hanson

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable. I can see much better clipping these on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. I can see much better clipping these on over my glasses instead of putting on those from the cinema over my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W

customer_reviews.title: Better
customer_reviews.text: They work. It's better than wearing the ones at the theater over your glasses for sure.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you wear glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can enjoy a movie without having to double stack 2 glasses together. These lenses are a lot lighter than you think, and they are perfect for your movie nights.
customer_reviews.author: Shaowei Jiang

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t work :-(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my parents who didn’t want to see the movie in 3D because they both wear glasses and they didn’t want to wear the movie theatre glasses over their prescription glasses. They ended up having to do what they didn’t want to do because the 3D Clip On Glasses didn’t work :-( I felt bad :-(
customer_reviews.author: Trish Miyashiro

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great. Good price, fit on the smaller size, stylish. Love that each pair comes with a bag and cleaning cloth.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: These didn't work at all unlike my other pair. Packaged nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute glasses and did what they were bought for. Seem sturdy and like they will last.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Works on some movies but not others. Don't know why. Really strange.

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work
customer_reviews.text: To sum it up, they don’t work at all. 😕
customer_reviews.author: C. Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I have an LG OLED passive 3D tv. The Real3D lens worked perfect and a huge improvement over the stock glasses for those of us that wear glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Artemas

customer_reviews.title: Needed these!!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to put 3D goggles over my regular glasses. The fit was awkward and they would slide down. These clip-ons were perfect! They fit my glasses very well and they performed great at the theatre.
customer_reviews.author: DJ CSharp

customer_reviews.title: Work well and non darkening.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a friend who loves 3D movies. He loves them. Nice carrying case.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work with most 3D theaters.
customer_reviews.text: I fourty Italy they don’t work with many 3D Theator’s as the ad says. My theater is Dolby Digital 3D which is still passive but these will not work with so I had to wear the bad bulky theater ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: The Imax experience was better than the provided glasses because the sides are shielded from outside light. The only issue is they fit snug and the glasses creep all the way onto your head, event when you try to put them down a bit on your nose. I would buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Teeman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my family to see Frozen 2 in RealD at the theater

customer_reviews.title: Only one works
customer_reviews.text: One is pretty clear but the other is very blurry

customer_reviews.title: Much better than free AMC glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me at AMC theatres. Better quality, bigger lens, and more comfortable than the standard free ones.
customer_reviews.author: J. Huber

customer_reviews.title: I no longer avoid 3D movies.
customer_reviews.text: I used to avoid 3D movies because I didn't like stacking 3D glasses over my prescription glasses. These drastically improved my 3D movie experience.
customer_reviews.author: JBR

customer_reviews.title: These are glorified sun glasses NOT for 3d movies
customer_reviews.text: We just started to watch a movie in 3D the movie is divided in the centre and the glasses did nothing at all. The movies were on Video Club on the TV so as far as I'm concerned this was a waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: RealD glasses worked. The IMAX they didn’t as well ...
customer_reviews.text: RealD glasses worked. The IMAX they didn’t as well. The size needs to be larger to accommodate different shapes of glasses.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Used at an IMAX movie. Was well worth the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Can't find anywhere they work
customer_reviews.text: I've tried these several times in several different places and haven't worked anywhere. They are basically just light shaded sunglasses.

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D clipons
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for SW:ROS and they worked so much better than traditional glasses. Would definitely recommend to anyone

customer_reviews.title: Delicate, but effective
customer_reviews.text: These are great for people who hate the experience of wearing 3D glasses on top of their prescription glasses. They are very thin, and feel more than a little delicate when clipping them on, but once they're in place they work very well.

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: I don't see any 3d effect from glasses it's like simple plain glass

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my old LG cinema 3D 55in tv.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: They are a piece of S##t. I got two different glasses.

customer_reviews.title: Yay ! No more glasses over glasses..
customer_reviews.text: So easy and comfortable to wear over my regular glasses. Work great.

customer_reviews.title: I tried these at Solo: A Star Wars Story ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried these at Solo: A Star Wars Story. They did not work at all and I had to use the theater's glasses. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Clark

product_meta.title: AoHeng 3D Clip on Glasses for Movies/Theater/Cinema/Passive 3D TV(RealD and IMAX) 2Pack
product_meta.description:
Size:3D CLIP| Color:Round RealD&IMAX 2PACKThank you for visiting AoHeng

AoHeng makes 3D glasses.The lens experience must be the best and the design must be the best.This is the original intention of AoHeng to make any glasses.

We will always respond positively to negative reviews from customers and friends,because only in this way can we truly be satisfied with each customer and be a true 5-star seller.
The most negative reviews is that the RealD format is not suitable for 3D TVs,because most customers are active 3D TVs, but they have purchased our passive RealD 3D glasses, which of course is not suitable,so friends who buy 3D glasses for 3D TVs,be sure to buy after asking.If you do not ask the seller,it is not applicable after purchase,please do not write negative reviews,thank you!
There are very few negative reviews put together as follows:
1.3D clips are not suitable for my glasses. We guarantee that 99% of customers are suitable.No clips can guarantee that all glasses are suitable. If not suitable,please send pictures to us to prove that it is really inappropriate.We will return the money to you,you do not need to return it,so you can give it to your friends as a gift.
2.3D glasses have no effect.We promise that every glasses have strict quality inspection,and no any product has quality problems.

Special Note
1.RealD format is only suitable for mainstream RealD format 3D cinema and passive 3D TV, Not suitable for dolby digital 3D,Not suitable for active 3D TV
2.IMAX format is only suitable for IMAX3D theater,not for IMAX laser 3D theater 

Our after-sales service must also be the best
1.90 days no reason to return
2.Damaged during normal use within 1 year, please contact us to mail new products for free

SELL 3D PRODUCTS WITH THE BEST DESIGN AND BEST LENSES.A FAMOUS SAYING:YOU WILL NEVER WAKE A PERSON WHO PRETENDS TO SLEEP,BUT WE BELIEVE THAT THE CUSTOMERS WHO VISIT AOHENG WILL NOT BE THIS KIND OF PERSON.
feature_bullets: 【Learn about 3D lenses】We have no use and comparison. It is difficult to know whether the 3D lens effect is the best. In fact, our manufacturers use the monomer transmittance to determine the pros and cons of 3D lens effects. Most manufacturers believe that they only need to provide users with parameters not exceeding 42%,but this parameter can't be clear and bright, AoHeng's lens has the highest parameter of 43.5%, so our lenses are clearer and brighter.

【Best experience】Friends who wear glasses know that the nose is very sensitive to product weight. Even if the weight is increased by 1g, we will feel stronger pressure.Our product weight is only less than half of other 3D clips,which greatly improves our happiness of watching movies.Our clips and glasses are connected in the same way and fit perfectly, so there is no reflection or glare from other clips.Profession is to focus on any detail you care about.

【Hand made,Worth having】With a new generation of man-machine engineering micro-clamp,make our 3D clips are connect to the same way as the eyeglasses we wear,and make our clip and our lens keep highly laminating,so they 100% don't interfere with the vision.It's light enough and it doesn't interfere with vision,we even feel like we're not wearing clips.On a day when we want to see a 3D visual blockbuster,you will find this handmade comfortable clip is worth having.

【Bad customer experience reply(Continuous updates to provide more reference for your purchase)】➊No 3D effect:There are 2 3D clips in the package. One RealD3D clip is suitable for mainstream RealD3D cinema and passive 3D TV, and the other IMAX3D clip is suitable for IMAX3D cinema and not suitable for IMAX laser 3D cinema.Be sure to use it correctly.

【Focus on a best customer experience】Because AoHeng believes that anything that can enhance the happiness of customers is our eternal pursuit. Therefore, our products will do their best to make detailed product descriptions and product advantages descriptions,timely feedback of customer dissatisfaction,so that you can choose more satisfactory products. Listening to the true voice of our customers is always the motto of AoHeng brand management.
